languages.text: "Очень похоже на сговор между милыми кузенами-ксеносами, ажи бы их побрали. Нечастое явление для эльдаров и друкари... и все же не невозможное".
"Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."
languages.original_text: "Очень похоже на сговор между милыми кузенами-ксеносами, ажи бы их побрали. Нечастое явление для эльдаров и друкари... и все же не невозможное".

traits.locale_text: "Looks very much like a conspiracy between the loveable xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."
"Looks very much like a conspiracy between the loveable xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."
"Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."
"Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."
"Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."

languages.text: “在我看来，很像是那群异形之间达成了什么阴谋，愿鬼怪诅咒他们。对艾达灵族和黑暗灵族而言，这样的做法确实相当罕见……但绝非不可能。”
languages.original_text: "Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，很像是那群异形之间达成了什么阴谋，愿鬼怪诅咒他们。对艾达灵族和黑暗灵族而言，这样的做法确实相当罕见……但绝非不可能。”

languages.text: « Cela ressemble fort à une machination entre les charmants cousins xénos, que les azhi les emportent. Un fait plutôt rare entre Aeldaris et Drukharis... mais loin d'être impossible. »
languages.original_text: "Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."

traits.locale_text: « Cela ressemble fort à une machination entre les charmants cousins xénos, que les azhis les emportent. Un fait plutôt rare entre Aeldaris et Drukharis... mais loin d'être impossible. »

languages.text: "Wirkt absolut wie eine Verschwörung zwischen den charmanten Xenos-Vettern, möge Azhi sie dreifach verdammen. Ziemlich ungewöhnlich für Aeldari und Drukhari ... Aber ganz und gar nicht unmöglich."
languages.original_text: "Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."

traits.locale_text: "Wirkt absolut wie eine Verschwörung zwischen den charmanten Xenos-Vettern, möge Azhi sie dreifach verdammen. Ziemlich ungewöhnlich für Aeldari und Drukhari ... Aber ganz und gar nicht unmöglich."

languages.text: «Tiene toda la pinta de ser una conspiración entre estos primos xenos. Que los azhi se los lleven... Es inusual que los Aeldari y los Drukhari hayan actuado así, pero no imposible».
languages.original_text: "Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene toda la pinta de ser una conspiración entre estos primos xenos. Que los azhi se los lleven... Es inusual que los Aeldari y los Drukhari hayan actuado así, pero no imposible».

languages.text: 「アジーも三度にわたって非難するほど、魅力的な異種族同士による陰謀のようだ。アエルダリとデュカーリには珍しいことだ。しかし、あり得ないことではない」
languages.original_text: "Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."

traits.locale_text: 「アジーも三度にわたって非難するほど、魅力的な異種族同士による陰謀のようだ。アエルダリとデュカーリには珍しいことだ。しかし、あり得ないことではない」

languages.text: "Soydaş zenoların kurduğu bir tertip olduğu besbelli. Azhi kahredesiceler. Aeldariler ve Drukhariler için sık görülen bir şey değil... Fakat imkânsız da değil."
languages.original_text: "Looks very much like a conspiracy between the charming xenos cousins, azhi condemn them thrice over. An uncommon occurrence for the Aeldari and the Drukhari... But far from impossible."
